mandatory.name: Rabies
mandatory.description: A viral disease fatal to dogs and humans. First dose includes microchipping. Required by Israeli law.

recommended.name: Hexavalent Vaccine
recommended.description: Protects against 6 diseases: Canine Distemper Virus (CDV), Canine Adenovirus Type 2 (CAV-2), Canine Parvovirus (CPV), Leptospirosis (Two Serovars), Canine Parainfluenza Virus (CPiV), and Canine Coronavirus (CCV).

recommended.name: Spirocerca Lupi (Park Worm) Prevention
recommended.description: Prevents infection by a parasitic worm common in Israel, which can cause severe illness, including esophageal tumors.

preventative_treatments.name: Fleas & Ticks Prevention
preventative_treatments.frequency: Monthly or as advised by vet
preventative_treatments.description: Protects against infestations that cause skin irritation, anemia, and disease transmission (e.g., Ehrlichiosis from ticks).

preventative_treatments.name: Internal Parasites
preventative_treatments.description: Prevents roundworms, tapeworms, hookworms, and other intestinal parasites.
